Token.Abstract: This protocol defines the optional methods used to receive updates from the Analytics service.
Notifies the delegate that the analytics service successfully posted events to the analytics server. The delegate will be notified on the main dispatch queue.

Parameter.Name: analytics
Parameter.Abstract: The analytics that generated the event.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The REST request used to post the analytics events to the analytics server.

Parameter.Name: response
Parameter.Abstract: The REST server response to the posting of analytics events.

Parameter.Name: responseData
Parameter.Abstract: The data returned by the analytics server in response to the posting of analytics events.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the analytics service suffered the specified error. The delegate will be notified on the main dispatch queue.

Parameter.Name: analytics
Parameter.Abstract: The analytics that generated the event.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error generated by the analytics service, typically related to posting analytics events.
